attributes.background: Stop refugees men of military age coming to UK. Help them protect and take back their own country

rejection.details:
We're not clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.  You may find that there is already a petition about this open on the site:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?state=open

If not, you could start a new petition which states clearly the action you would like to see. Please note that you will need to give your full name for us to accept your petition.
